name: Platinum Tier Qualification
description: Comprehensive qualification process for platinum cards
content:
rule "Platinum Tier Qualification":
    if applicant.annualIncome >= 200000 and applicant.creditScore >= 780 then
        platinumApproval, "assign concierge services", setupPlatinumBenefits
    if applicant.annualIncome >= 150000 and applicant.creditScore >= 750 then
        conditionalPlatinum, requestFinancialVerification
    else rejectPlatinum, "suggest premium alternative"
